Reviews.Title: Decent for it's price
Reviews.Author: Eddie E. Suarez "Copone"
Reviews.Content: Pros: Wireless is strong and E-Net is super easy to configure. Easy to use HTML page. Great Movement, Super sensitive Mic. I use it on all my devices!!!Cons: Power supply included does not have enough Amps to properly power the camera.Very 3rd party, good luck finding up to date firmware.

ProductInfo.Features:
Allow remote viewing & record from anywhere anytime
Support Iphone, Windows Mobile, Symbian, Android cell phone view
Motion detection alert via email or upload image to FTP
Rotation Angle Pan: 270 degree Tilt: 120 degree
Simple and quick to setup, friendly user interface
ProductInfo.Name: Night Vision Wireless Network IP Camera Motion Detection Dual Audio Alarm Pan 270 ° Tilt 120° Security WIFI IP Camera Outdoor Waterproof Night Internet IR Cam system
